title: Cicero Brutus 3 - we learn in lines 4-5

content.question: We learn from the words ut . . . consederit (lines 4-5) that

choices.label: Cicero at first was distressed to see his friends
the presence of his friends eased Cicero’s political concerns
Cicero and his friends sat down to discuss their country
Cicero was distressed because no one cared about the republic

content.answer: the presence of his friends eased Cicero’s political concerns
